collection.name: Beanstalk without Jack
collection.openText: It might sound like a crazy story, but I heard there was an employee here who was determined to climb the tree right up to the top. and so he did...

specialTipSize.specialTip: At the end of Instinct work, if the work results were good, the employee working on it received a gift.
At the end of Instinct work, if the work results were bad, the employee who was working on it died.
At the end of Insight work, the amount of PE-Boxes produced increased.
At the end of Repression work, the employee working received RED damage, regardless of results.
